On exposure and accountability

Some thanks and apologies are in order.

I decided to start this blog at the encouragement of a friend who told me that some of the musings I shared with her might have broader appeal. As goes the usual disclaimer, all mistakes contained herein are my own, but I take comfort in having her initial support. To Emily, my thanks. I hope that some of what I write here is of interest to you.

Thanks are also due to Ronen, who recently started a blog, inspiring me to do the same.
